products.title: Metz Pvc Blackout Ash Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The metz pvc blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, metz fabrics are durable and practical. Vertical blinds offer optimal light and privacy control, so are a firm favourite in the uk, especially with overlooked houses and office. This stylish dark grey, marbled, ash grey blackout vertical blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchensat swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new vertical blind is made by their expert team, in their yorkshire workshop, and comes with a free five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.

products.title: Uniview 3200 Spectre Black/grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their spectre black / grey is a bold, modern choice.

products.title: Sio Charcoal 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Delicate yet dark and sophisticated, the sio charcoal vertical blind will make a decidedly glamorous addition to your space. Golden stems gracefully snake across a brooding charcoal grey backdrop, giving length and flow to the print and an alluring exotic vibe. Expertly printed on durable dimout fabric, this vertical blind will work well in a room with dark, rich colours, velvet fabrics and gold or copper accents.
